department: Public Works and Government Services of Canada
short_summary: The 5 CDSB Gagetown Fire Services requires the supply, installation and the commissioning of a Class B fueled ARFF training system at the Fire Department`s current training area.
description: The solicitation of the Contract is for the supply, installation, and commissioning of a Class B fueled ARFF training system.
tags: World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
